text: 17.26: Zo 15.9; 15.15; 17.6Gu tuituigiap ndu bun mbe suaŋgi. Gu khaŋ tɨgɨp ndu zɨ bun suaŋvra kɨrga, mbe guigira wari won ndavir harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi tɨva zɨn ŋgɨrga. Mbe ndu guigira won ndavar na nɨɨŋgi tɨvara, mbe wari won ndavir harigi gumgir nɨɨnga. Maaŋ muuŋgirga, gu vhɨra, gu mben kɨrga.”
